tooltip.achievement_rewards.tome_of_enli: Raises experience level to %1$s if it is below %1$s. Raises it by %2$s otherwise.
tooltip.achievement_rewards.shatter_glas: Every %1$s hit, deals %2$s bonus magic damage.
tooltip.achievement_rewards.sustain_swor: Deals %1$s of target's max health as magic damage on hit and heals for %2$s of the pre-mitigated damage dealt.
